name: df-mpst
body: |- wceq(cmpst, cmpt(s0, universe, cxp(cxp(crab(s1, cpw(cfv(cmdv, cv(s0))), wceq(ccnv(cv(s1)), cv(s1))), cin(cpw(cfv(cmex, cv(s0))), cfn)), cfv(cmex, cv(s0)))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ mPreSt =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(({ s1 ‚àà P((mDV ` s0))| `' s1 = s1 } √ó(P((mEx ` s0))‚ãÇ Fin))√ó(mEx ` s0)))
comment: Define the set of all pre-statements. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)
